# GitHub Milestones

Create these milestones in your repository settings:

## Milestone 1: Foundation
- **Title**: Phase 1: Foundation
- **Due date**: 2 weeks from now
- **Description**: Chrome Web Store optimization, landing page completion, technical SEO setup

## Milestone 2: Content Marketing
- **Title**: Phase 2: Content Marketing
- **Due date**: 6 weeks from now
- **Description**: Core content pieces, SEO content strategy, content calendar execution

## Milestone 3: Community Building
- **Title**: Phase 3: Community Building
- **Due date**: 8 weeks from now
- **Description**: Reddit strategy, Twitter presence, Product Hunt launch, Notion community

## Milestone 4: Growth & Partnerships
- **Title**: Phase 4: Growth & Partnerships
- **Due date**: 12 weeks from now
- **Description**: Partnership outreach, review campaigns, influencer marketing

## Milestone 5: Expansion
- **Title**: Phase 5: Expansion
- **Due date**: 24 weeks from now
- **Description**: Feature development, internationalization, alternative distribution
